text_block_list.text: Hah… hah…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Tonight, just for this very moment, with our arms intertwined, the one reflected in her eyes will be me. And the one reflected in my eyes will be her… I won't let anyone take that away from me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Ha, haha… you really are Chiyono O-san's number one, dancing with her like that.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Oh, you came to watch too, Nature! Did you see those two dancing? They were totally amazing!
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Yeah, I saw them dance. More like they showed off for us.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Like, I think everyone in the committee thought the Teio-McQueen pair would snag first for sure, but we've got a surprise contender now!
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Wait, speak of the devil! They're gonna go toe-to-toe!
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: What's going on here, huh? Before you two started dancing, we were the stars of the show, y'know!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: And is that why you two are purposefully dancing next to us?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Surely you expected a direct confrontation too, Ardan-san?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Still, we're not…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: We're not gonna lose!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Wow, things are heating up with those two pairs! Sheesh… their movements just keep on getting sharper and sharper.
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Nature, don'tcha feel some pride, too? I mean, Teio-san's your classmate, right? Since you've always run in the same races, you can brag about that!
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right… She feels so far away. It's like she was born already standing in the spotlight.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: If I had to say, I'm more like a background extra who just watches her from shadows. That kind of thing.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: (Right, she and I aren't on the same stage. Someone like me could never be Teio's partner.)
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: (That's why I resigned myself to my fate and stuck to the committee side of things, just watching over everyone else. But…)
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Even if throughout our lives we find that we were not eachother's number one, for just this one special night, we were able to become eachother's irreplaceable partners.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (… Even if I can't be her "fated number one", if I could just be a special partner to her…)
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Huh? Nature?
text_block_list.name: Dorowa Committee Member

text_block_list.text: If I could… just…!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
